findingPerson: Finding the right person is harder than finding a good oat milk cappuccino in 2012.
sucksText: Dating apps suck. Networking is awkward. Making new friends as an adult is basically illegal. Travel buddies either ruin your trip or disappear when the bill comes. Business partners? Might as well be a toxic ex with equity.

info.heading: What Is Uniic?
paragraphs: Uniic is <bold>not</bold> another dating app, networking site, or ‚Äúexclusive community‚Äù that just sells you a membership.
It‚Äôs the <bold>first platform that actually finds people you‚Äôre compatible with</bold> ‚Äî across romance, friendship, travel, sports, and business.
Using <bold>psychometric testing</bold>, Uniic finds the right people for you based on:

categories.title: Romance

date: Effective Date: July 1st, 2025. Last Updated: July 1st, 2025
intro: This Privacy Policy explains how Woooz Inc. (‚ÄúWoooz,‚Äù ‚Äúwe,‚Äù ‚Äúour,‚Äù or ‚Äúus‚Äù) collects, uses, discloses, and protects your information when you use the Uniic mobile application and related services (collectively, the ‚ÄúApp‚Äù). By using Uniic, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree, please do not use the App.

acceptance.title: 1. Eligibility
acceptance.points: Uniic is intended for users 18 years of age or older. We do not knowingly collect personal information from anyone under 18. If we become aware that a user is under 18, we will take steps to delete their information.

collect.info: We collect the following types of information:
collect.title: a. Information You Provide to Us
items: Account Information: Email address, username, password, and optional profile photo.
User Content: Posts, messages, images, videos, and any content you share or upload.
Support Requests: Information you provide when contacting customer support.

usage.title: b. Information We Collect Automatically
items: Device Data: IP address, device ID, operating system, browser type, and language.
Usage Data: App interactions, content views, features used, crash logs, and diagnostics.
Location Data: General geographic location based on your IP (no GPS tracking).

sharing.title: c. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
items: We use cookies and similar technologies to enable features, analyze usage, and personalize content. You may control cookie settings via your browser.

rights.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
items: Operate, maintain, and improve the Uniic App.
Personalize content and recommendations.
Communicate with you (e.g., support, notifications).
Prevent fraud, abuse, and policy violations.
Comply with legal obligations.

sharing.title: 4. Sharing of Information
sharing.desc: We do not sell your personal information. We may share it only with:
items: Service Providers: Cloud hosting, analytics, email delivery, content moderation.
Legal Authorities: When required to comply with legal obligations or enforce our rights.
Business Transfers: If Woooz Inc. is involved in a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets.

userRights.title: 5. Your Rights and Choices
userRights.desc: Depending on your location, you may have the right to:
items: Access: Request a copy of your data.
Correct: Update inaccurate or incomplete data.
Delete: Request deletion of your account and data.
Restrict or Object: Limit how we use your information.
Port: Receive your data in a structured, machine-readable format.
To exercise any of these rights, email us at privacy@uniic.app.

dataRetention.title: 6. Data Retention
dataRetention.points: We retain your information for as long as necessary to provide the App and comply with legal requirements. Upon request, we will delete your data unless retention is required by law.

security.title: 7. Security
security.points: We implement technical and organizational safeguards to protect your information, including encryption, access controls, and regular audits. However, no method of transmission or storage is 100% secure.

international.title: 8. International Transfers
international.points: If you are located outside the United States, please be aware that your data may be processed and stored in the U.S. By using Uniic, you consent to the transfer of your data to the U.S. and other jurisdictions as necessary.

thirdParty.title: 9. Third-Party Services
thirdParty.points: Uniic may contain links to third-party services. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of those services. Please review their privacy policies independently.

policyChanges.title: 10. Changes to This Privacy Policy
policyChanges.points: We may update this policy from time to time. If we make material changes, we will notify you via in-app notice or email. Your continued use of Uniic after changes are posted constitutes your acceptance.

contact.title: 11. Contact Us
items: For questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:
üìß privacy@uniic.app.
üè¢ Woooz Inc.
2155 Pantages Circle, Rancho Cordova, CA, 95670

tdate: Effective Date: July 1st, 2025. Last Updated: July 1st, 2025
tintro: Welcome to Uniic! These Terms and Conditions (‚ÄúTerms‚Äù) govern your access to and use of the Uniic app (‚ÄúApp‚Äù), including any content, features, and services made available by Woooz, Inc. (‚Äúwe‚Äù, ‚Äúus‚Äù, or ‚Äúour‚Äù). By using Uniic, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree, please do not use the app.

eligibility.title: 1. Eligibility
eligibility.points: You must be at least 18 years old to use Uniic.

userAccounts.title: 2. User Accounts
items: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your login credentials.
You agree to provide accurate and complete information.
You may not impersonate another person or use a false identity.

ugcPolicy.title: 3. User-Generated Content (UGC) Policy
ugcPolicy.description: Uniic enables users to create, post, and share content. By submitting content, you grant Uniic a non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free license to use, store, display, reproduce, and distribute your content within the app.
ugcPolicy.prohibitionsTitle: You agree not to upload, post, or share content that:
prohibitions: Contains hate speech, harassment, or abusive behavior
Promotes or depicts violence, self-harm, or sexually explicit material
Violates any applicable laws or regulations
Contains misleading, fraudulent, or harmful information
ugcPolicy.zeroTolerance: Zero Tolerance: Uniic has a strict zero-tolerance policy for objectionable content and abusive users.

contentModeration.title: 4. Content Moderation & Reporting
items: To keep the community safe:
We use automated filters and human moderators to detect and remove objectionable content.
Users can flag inappropriate content or report abusive behavior directly in the app.
Users may block or mute others to avoid unwanted interactions.
We review all reports within 24 hours and take appropriate action, including content removal or user suspension/ban.
Uniic reserves the right to remove content or terminate accounts at our sole discretion, without notice, if you violate these terms.

privacyPolicyRef.title: 5. Privacy Policy
points: We care about your privacy. Please read our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect, use, and protect your personal information. Key principles:
We collect minimal data necessary to operate the app (e.g., email, device info, app usage).
We do not sell your personal data to third parties.
You can request access to, correction of, or deletion of your personal data at any time.
Data is securely stored and encrypted.
We comply with applicable privacy laws, including GDPR and CCPA.

intellectualProperty.title: 6. Intellectual Property
points: All app content (excluding user submissions) including logos, trademarks, text, graphics, and software are the property of Uniic or its licensors.
You may not copy, modify, or distribute content from the app without permission.

prohibitedConduct.title: 7. Prohibited Conduct
items: You agree not to:
Use the app for any unlawful or harmful purpose
Interfere with the app‚Äôs operation, servers, or networks
Upload viruses, malware, or malicious code
Attempt to gain unauthorized access to other user accounts or our backend systems

termination.title: 8. Termination
termination.points: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access to the app at any time, with or without cause, especially in cases of policy violations, abuse, or threats to platform integrity.

disclaimers.title: 9. Disclaimers
disclaimers.points: Uniic is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee uninterrupted service or that the app will be error-free. Use at your own risk.

limitationOfLiability.title: 10. Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.points: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Uniic is not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages resulting from your use of the app or any user-generated content therein.

changesToTerms.title: 11. Changes to Terms
changesToTerms.points: We may update these Terms from time to time. If we make significant changes, we will notify you through the app or by email. Continued use of the app after changes means you accept the updated Terms.

contact.title: 12. Contact Us
items: For questions, concerns, or abuse reports, contact us at:
üìß support@uniic.app
